GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/tasks.description: serves an array of all tasks

GET /api/tasks/taskID.description: serves a task dependant on taskID

PATCH /api/tasks/taskID.description: Updates a task dependant on taskID

DELETE /api/tasks/taskID.description: Deletes a task dependant on taskID

GET /api/users/:userID/tasks.description: serves an array of tasks dependant on user id

GET /api/users/:userID/tasks/category.description: serves an array of tasks dependant on category

GET /api/users/:userID/tasks?sort_by=dat.description: serves an array of tasks sorted by date order

GET /api/users/:userID/tasks?sort_by=pri.description: adds a comment based on article_id
